title: New way to annoy your teammates
body:
Just spam ping their items. If you spam ping their items, they'll never know it's you. Even if they mute everyone's pings and chat on the team, it doesn't matter, it'll still go through. This technique cannot be muted, and they will never know it's you so they can't report you. IT's a win win situation to piss them off easy.

This is a shitpost. Please let us see who is pinging our items and let us mute it.

replies.body: Doubly good when your ADC has a firecannon and no sources of AD at all, at 15 minutes.
